SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Budget Motels relative to Eco Lodges?
SRP.A: Budget Motels is {above} Eco Lodges in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total hotel occupancy rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Budget Motels}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total hotel occupancy rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Eco Lodges}.

VE.A: Budget Motels's hotel occupancy rate in 2012 is {100} %.

VE.Q: What is Budget Motels's Hotel Occupancy Rate in 2008?
VE.A: Budget Motels's hotel occupancy rate in 2008 is {100} %.

VE.Q: What are the hotel occupancy rate of Budget Motels, Eco Lodges, and Boutique Inns in 2017?
VE.A: Budget Motels's hotel occupancy rate is {100} %, Eco Lodges's hotel occupancy rate is {0.75} %, Boutique Inns's hotel occupancy rate is {1.68} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Hotel Occupancy Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum hotel occupancy rate is {0.75} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Hotel Occupancy Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum hotel occupancy rate is {100.00} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Hotel Occupancy Rate level recorded for Boutique Inns?

SC.Q: What is the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate?
SC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate is {144.49} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate fall between 136.68 and 151.06 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1995 and 2007, was the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate higher or lower than between 1994 and 2006?
NC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate between 1995 and 2007 was {lower} than between 1994 and 2006.

NC.Q: Between 2018 and 2020, was the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate higher or lower than between 2011 and 2013?
NC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate between 2018 and 2020 was {lower} than between 2011 and 2013.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2022, was the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate higher or lower than between 2002 and 2022?
NC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate between 1998 and 2022 was {higher} than between 2002 and 2022.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2018, was the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate higher or lower than between 2013 and 2018?
NC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate between 2001 and 2018 was {higher} than between 2013 and 2018.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Budget Motels} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Eco Lodges, Boutique Inns, Budget Motels}.
